actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals to receive refundable credit against income tax for renting to or maintaining a household for certain individuals who have obtained the age of 65.

summary.text: Senior Citizens Housing Act of 1980 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax credit to any taxpayer who rents a dwelling unit to or maintains a household for an individual aged 65 or over. Limits such credit to $500 for each such individual for the taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals to receive refundable credit against income tax for renting to or maintaining a household for certain individuals who have obtained the age of 65.
